content: {"name": "Accion Academy", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Need to get registered in school library, Food distribution is not fixed you will get message when they will distribute food", "email": "", "url": "https://insideschools.org/school/12X384", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "977 Fox St", "address_2": null, "city": "New York", "state_province": "NY", "postal_code": "10459", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.8220835, "longitude": -73.8940382}, "phones": [{"number": "(718) 378-1649", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "21:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "21:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "21:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "21:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "21:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Clients can visit: Once a month"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Call in advance for services"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Proof of household income required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Appointments required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Registration required on site"}]}
